conbody.p:
The following table describes the stages installed with each stage library:
Stage Library Name Included Stages
streamsets-datacollector-apache-kafka_0_8_1-lib For Kafka version 0.8.1.x.
Includes the Kafka Consumer and Kafka Producer.
streamsets-datacollector-apache-kafka_0_8_2-lib For Kafka version 0.8.2.x.
Includes the Kafka Consumer and Kafka Producer.
streamsets-datacollector-apache-kafka_0_9-lib For Kafka version 0.9.0.0.
Includes the Kafka Consumer and Kafka Producer.
streamsets-datacollector-apache-kudu-0_7-lib For Kudu version 0.7.1.
Includes the Kudu destination.
streamsets-datacollector-aws-lib For Amazon Web Services 1.10.20.
Includes the Amazon S3 origin and destination, the Kinesis Consumer, the Kinesis Firehose destination, and the Kinesis Producer.
streamsets-datacollector-basic-lib Installs automatically with the basic installation.
Includes the following origins:
Directory
File Tail
HTTP Client
SDC RPC
UDP Source
Includes all processors except the Jython Evaluator.
Includes the following destinations:
Local FS
SDC RPC
To Error
Trash
streamsets-datacollector-cassandra_2-lib For Cassandra 2.1.5. Can be used for Cassandra 1.2, 2.0, and 2.1.x.
Includes the Cassandra destination.
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_5_2-lib
For the Cloudera CDH version 5.2.6 distribution of Hadoop.
Includes:
Hadoop FS origin for cluster mode pipelines
Flume destination
Hadoop FS destination
HBase destination
Solr
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_5_3-lib
For the Cloudera CDH version 5.3.8 distribution of Hadoop.
Includes:
Hadoop FS origin for cluster mode pipelines
Flume destination
Hadoop FS destination
HBase destination
Solr
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_5_4-lib
For the Cloudera CDH version 5.4.8 distribution of Hadoop.
Includes:
Hadoop FS origin for cluster mode pipelines
Flume destination
Hadoop FS destination
HBase destination
Hive Streaming destination
Solr
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_5_5-lib
For the Cloudera CDH version 5.5.0 distribution of Hadoop.
Includes:
Hadoop FS origin for cluster mode pipelines
Flume destination
Hadoop FS destination
HBase destination
Hive Streaming destination
Solr
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_5_4-cluster-cdh_kafka_1_2-lib
For the Cloudera version 5.4.8 distribution of Apache Kafka 1.2.0.
Includes the Kafka Consumer origin for cluster mode pipelines.
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_5_4-cluster-cdh_kafka_1_3-lib
For the Cloudera version 5.4.8 distribution of Apache Kafka 1.3.2.
Includes the Kafka Consumer origin for cluster mode pipelines.
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_5_5-cluster-cdh_kafka_1_3-lib
For the Cloudera version 5.5.0 distribution of Apache Kafka 1.3.2.
Includes the Kafka Consumer origin for cluster mode pipelines.
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_kafka_1_2-lib For the Cloudera distribution of Apache Kafka 1.2.0 (0.8.2.0).
Includes the Kafka Consumer and Kafka Producer.
streamsets-datacollector-cdh_kafka_1_3-lib For the Cloudera distribution of Apache Kafka 1.3.0 (0.8.2.0).
Includes the Kafka Consumer and Kafka Producer.
streamsets-datacollector-elasticsearch_1_4-lib For Elasticsearch 1.4.5.
Includes the Elasticsearch destination.
streamsets-datacollector-elasticsearch_1_5-lib For Elasticsearch 1.5.2.
Includes the Elasticsearch destination.
streamsets-datacollector-elasticsearch_1_6-lib For Elasticsearch 1.6.
Includes the Elasticsearch destination.
streamsets-datacollector-elasticsearch_1_7-lib For Elasticsearch 1.7.
Includes the Elasticsearch destination.
streamsets-datacollector-elasticsearch_2_0-lib For Elasticsearch 2.0.
Includes the Elasticsearch destination.
streamsets-datacollector-elasticsearch_2_1-lib For Elasticsearch 2.1.
Includes the Elasticsearch destination.
streamsets-datacollector-elasticsearch_2_2-lib For Elasticsearch 2.2.
Includes the Elasticsearch destination.
streamsets-datacollector-groovy_2_4-lib For Groovy version 2.4.6. Installs with the basic installation.
Includes the Groovy Evaluator processor.
streamsets-datacollector-hdp_2_2-lib For the Hortonworks version 2.2.x distribution of Apache Hadoop.
Includes:
Hadoop FS origin for cluster mode pipelines
Kafka Consumer
Flume destination
Hadoop FS destination
HBase destination
Hive Streaming destination
Kafka Producer
streamsets-datacollector-hdp_2_3-lib For the Hortonworks version 2.3.x distribution of Apache Hadoop.
Includes:
Hadoop FS origin for cluster mode pipelines
Kafka Consumer
Flume destination
Hadoop FS destination
HBase destination
Hive Streaming destination
Kafka Producer
streamsets-datacollector-influxdb-0_9-lib For InfluxDB version 0.9 or greater.
Includes the InfluxDB destination.
streamsets-datacollector-jdbc-lib Includes the JDBC Consumer and Producer.
streamsets-datacollector-jms-lib Includes the JMS Consumer.
streamsets-datacollector-jython_2_7-lib For Jython version 2.7.0. Installs with the basic installation.
Includes the Jython Evaluator processor.
streamsets-datacollector-mapr_5_0-lib For MapR version 5.0.
Includes the MapR Streams Consumer, MapR Streams Producer, and MapR FS.
streamsets-datacollector-mapr_5_1-lib For MapR version 5.1.
Includes the MapR Streams Consumer, MapR Streams Producer, and MapR FS.
streamsets-datacollector-mongodb_3-lib For MongoDB 3.0.2.
Includes the MongoDB origin.
streamsets-datacollector-omniture-lib Includes the Omniture origin.
streamsets-datacollector-rabbitmq-lib For RabbitMQ version 3.5.6.
Includes the RabbitMQ Consumer and RabbitMQ Producer.
